name: JIM Puncher (Game Jam)
description:
You like punching.
Jim likes punching.
His enemies like punching.
Everyone likes punching.
Punch the air.
Punch. Punch. Punch.
And maybe punch some more.

Get a high combo count and punch everyone in the face in JIM Puncher, a punching packed platformer/beat 'em up with no annoying HUDs to distract you from punching.
Use 4 out of the hundreds keys on the keyboard to punch.
Don't die.
It's a nice, simple head-to-head brawl.

Made in about 16 hours for Tim Ruswick's JimJam.

Created by LevyMarCiS
Sounds from freesound.org
